about_the_game: From Paradox Development Studio’s original sci-fi title, Stellaris, comes the complete soundtrack composed by Andreas Waldetoft and Meyer, including performances by the Brandenburg State Orchestra and Budapest Film Orchestra. With the full score from the initial game, along with new tracks from expansion content such as Apocalypse, Distant Stars, and more, this soundtrack contains a total of 57 tracks, with over five hours of music, fusing melodic orchestral performance with synthetic creations. Enjoy on the audio device of your choice in high quality mp3 and flac formats. This soundtrack provides fans with a growing, living set of music, with more tracks to be added as Stellaris continues to expand in the future.
detailed_description: From Paradox Development Studio’s original sci-fi title, Stellaris, comes the complete soundtrack composed by Andreas Waldetoft and Meyer, including performances by the Brandenburg State Orchestra and Budapest Film Orchestra. With the full score from the initial game, along with new tracks from expansion content such as Apocalypse, Distant Stars, and more, this soundtrack contains a total of 57 tracks, with over five hours of music, fusing melodic orchestral performance with synthetic creations. Enjoy on the audio device of your choice in high quality mp3 and flac formats. This soundtrack provides fans with a growing, living set of music, with more tracks to be added as Stellaris continues to expand in the future.
legal_notice: ©2016-2022 and published by Paradox Interactive AB. STELLARIS and PARADOX INTERACTIVE are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of Paradox Interactive AB in Europe, the U.S., and other countries. Other trademarks, logos, and copyrights are the property of their respective owners.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 x86
  • Processor: MD Athlon II X4 640 @ 3.0 Ghz / or Intel Core 2 Quad 9400 @ 2.66 Ghz
  • Graphics: AMD HD 5770 / or Nvidia GTX 460, with 1024MB VRAM. Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers.
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 x64
  • Processor: AMD HD 6850 / or Nvidia GTX 560TI, with 1024MB VRAM (Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers)
  • Graphics: AMD HD 6850 / or Nvidia GTX 560TI, with 1024MB VRAM (Latest available proprietary drivers from both manufacturers)
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8.5 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 6750 / NVIDIA GeForce 320 or higher with 1024MB VRAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.11 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.9Ghz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750M / or AMD R9 390M with 1024 VRAM
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller support: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers. Special multiplayer requirements: Internet Connection or LAN for multiplayer.

name: Stellaris: Complete Soundtrack
short_description: From Paradox Development Studio’s original sci-fi title, Stellaris, comes the complete soundtrack composed by Andreas Waldetoft and Meyer, including performances by the Brandenburg State Orchestra and Budapest Film Orchestra.
